dcterms:description: Daily (low frequency) time-series data set of average temperature and humidity used in this study are taken from the Korea Meteorological Administration (KMA) database. The ten metropolitan cities calculated and analyzed are Seoul, Incheon, Daejeon, Daegu, Busan, Pohang, Tongyeong, Gwangju, Mokpo, and Jeonju. The data covers the period from March 2014 to February 2020.
dcterms:title: Daily time-series data set of average temperature and humidity

dcterms:description: Low frequency time-series data for ten metropolitan cities of South Korea covering the period from March 2014 to February 2020, extracted from the manned regional meteorological offices of the KMA to ensure the reliability of data.
dcterms:title: Low frequency time-series data for ten metropolitan cities
